message.name: SEARCH_ZONE_GRADE_S
message.value: Can be obtained as a reward for superbosses or exchanged for useless rare reagents.

message.name: GRADE_S_DEMAND
message.value: Required for hats and artifacts crafting.

message.name: EQUIP_IS_ON_BOSS
message.value: This item is a reward for defeating the {bossName}

message.name: CRAFT_DISABLE_QTIP
message.value: The Armory will open when you reach level {level}

message.name: CRAFTED_ITEM_ADDED
message.value: The item is delivered to your house

message.name: CONFIRMATION_COLLECT_FOR_RUBIES_TEXT
message.value: Are you sure you want to buy this upgrade with rubies?

message.name: CONFIRMATION_COLLECT_TEXT
message.value: Are you sure you want to perform this upgrade?

message.name: REQUIRED_LEVEL_HINT
message.value: You need to be level {level} to perform this upgrade

message.name: CONFIRMATION_DOWNGRADE_TEXT
message.value: You get 80% of the resources when you disassemble a weapon. Are you sure you want to downgrade?

message.name: SEARCH_ZONE_GRADE_D
message.value: The best way to find one is to destroy the ground during missions or to collect crates from low wagers.

message.name: SEARCH_ZONE_GRADE_C
message.value: Can be found in the ground during missions or drops during battles with wagers. There's good chance to get one as a reward for beating a boss.

message.name: SEARCH_ZONE_GRADE_B
message.value: Drops from the sky during battles with high bets, also can be got as a reward for a boss. There's a very small chance to get one during a mission or low wager.

message.name: SEARCH_ZONE_GRADE_BOSS_RARE
message.value: A rare reagent. Can be obtained after boss fight win. Will be changed to Bombix badges if it is useless

message.name: GRADE_S_DEMAND
message.value: Required for hats and artifacts crafting.

message.name: BEST_EQUIP_ALREADY_EXIST
message.value: You already have an item of the highest quality!

message.name: CRAFT_VARIATION_HINT
message.value: Craft machine works unpredictably. Item quality depends on pure luck.

message.name: RECRAFT_VARIATION_HINT
message.value: Reforging an item gives you a chance to increase its quality.

message.name: RECRAFT_FAIL_POPUP2
message.value: You've put too much effort and broke the pincers.

message.name: RECRAFT_FAIL_POPUP3
message.value: You've hit a finger with a hammer.

message.name: RECRAFT_FAIL_POPUP4
message.value: You've pinched your ear with a gripe.

message.name: RECRAFT_FAIL_POPUP6
message.value: All the metal got consumed by vermin.

message.name: CRAFTED_MAX_QUALITY
message.value: You've got the best item of this kind!

message.name: SEARCH_ZONE_GRADE_R
message.value: This item is given as a reward for getting into a daily top.

message.name: NEW_ITEM_CRAFTED_3
message.value: Hey, take a look at what I've got: {item}!
